attributes.action: Regulate the media to control unbridled incitement to overspend
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The media constantly focuses attention onto Gov't, Banks, Regulators etc as being to blame for the credit crunch. Whilst all/any of these may have had potential to have caused symptoms i.e. the credit crunch, without a carrier the infection could not have spread so rapidly. The carrier which caused people to overspend generally, to go into buy to let, to buy properties abroad which they could not afford, to generally live beyond their income, has been the media. They must carry substantial responsibility but will never repport that in their papers/programmes/adverts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
